Articles.Content:
First of all, hi there!

It seems that every new kerbal comes here to say hello, so here I am too. I own the game for about three days by now, and it was an instant buy. It was no question: I get to build my on spacecrafts and I can pilot them too! It resembles Orbiter a bit, but I really miss the flight computer of the Delta spaceplanes. =P

I\'m in my mid 20\'s, I live in a nice town near the Hungarian capital. When I was a kid, I wanted to be an astronomer, so that\'s why I\'m hooked on everything related to space, but I eventually became some really weird liberal artist with a wide field of interest. That\'s why I have to plan trajectories by (mostly) trial and error. Oh, and my English should be acceptable to everybody. 8)

Safe return to everybody!

Szervusz!

Loved Budapest when I came over to stay last year, especially the hidden little gems like the nuclear bunker beneath the castle in Buda.

Welcome to the forums.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Szervusz!

Loved Budapest when I came over to stay last year, especially the hidden little gems like the nuclear bunker beneath the castle in Buda.

Welcome to the forums.

I see you\'ve learned the most important rule about Hungarians: use their language whenever you can. I\'m glad you liked your visit, mostly beacuse I think toursim could be handled a lot better. Budapest has lots of fun places to see and in the end of August there will be a beer festival in the castle of Buda.
